ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in light sensor controls IR activation. Aluminum housing with metal bracket
36 IR illuminators for night vision. Built-in mechanical IR-Cut filter switch
6.0mm Lens. NTSC signal system. 520TVL
Affordable day night color video security camera. Easy connection to TV, VCR, quad processor or DVR
Package including: 1 of CMOS camera, 1 of metal bracket, 1 of 12V 500mA power supply, 1 of video power extension cable and 1 of security warning decal
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Infrared Day Night Vision Outdoor Bullet Security Camera 520 TVL 36 IR LEDs Built-in Mechanical IR-Cut filter switch for CCTV DVR Home Surveillance System with Free Power Supply and Extension Cable IR808HN WK5
